column4: On a second, slightly less important note... All of these computers have the same name. I don't even know how to rename xUbuntu machines through the GUI, let alone command line... Can I make a script to rename them with something like Ram-Tux(Insert Random Number here) ?
It's slightly less important because the DNS/DHCP/Whatever bit of networking gear it is is refusing to admit they changed names since 5 years ago.
thanks, that does help, tells me something I didn't yet know... so now I just need to know how to change it to something a little less constant.
